Title: Requires hospitals to report cases of poisoning occurring within the hospital or which are presented to the hospital to the department of health and the regional poison control center
Summary: Requires hospitals to report cases of poisoning occurring within the hospital or which are presented to the hospital to the department of health and the regional poison control center.
LawCode: Amd ยง2805-l, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to mandating that hospitals report cases involving poison to poison control centers
